title: TERRIFIC TWO BEDROOM!!! 50% OFF FIRST 4 MONTHS RENT!!
posting_body: The application fee is $100.00 (money order) per each adult (18 years or older).
The administrative fee is $250.00 per unit.
You must have an ID and Social Security Card.
Please be prepared to wait for the information on your application to be verified.
Additional fees may be required due to credit and background.
Rental Criteria Guidelines
Gross monthly household income must equal three and a half (3.5) times the stated monthly rent.
A month’s current pay stubs from your employer will be required.
Must be verifiable income.
If you are paid bi-weekly, your last two (2) current paycheck stubs from your employer are required.
If you are paid weekly, your last four (4) paycheck stubs are required.
Self-employed applicants will be required to show proof of income through copies of the previous tax return.
Verifiable income includes, but is not limited to, bank statements, alimony/child support, trust accounts, Social Security, unemployment, grants, and loans.
Applicant credit history is verified by a third-party screening service, Real ID Inc.
Credit Score requirement is 550.
A Risk Management fee of $500 (non-refundable) will be assessed if you are a first-time renter or if you have a zero (0) credit score but you meet the INCOME REQUIREMENT.
A criminal background check will be conducted.
The application will be denied for drug related crimes, prostitution, firearms or crimes against person or property.
This would include felony or misdemeanor convictions.
Applicants cannot currently have an open Chapter 7 or Chapter 13 Bankruptcy.
Monthly Rent: Two Bedroom/Two Bath - $1277 (classic unit), $1427 (renovated)
Utilities $183 (Utilities include water, sewer, trash, and gas!)
Amenity $25
Valet Trash $30
WDF $31
Total due each month is $1546.00(Classic), $1696.00 (Renovated)
